articles.title: Ben & Jerry's debuts frozen dog treats, a passion project inspired by its pet friendly workplace - CNBC
articles.description: The ice cream maker has developed Doggie Desserts, two flavors of frozen treats that will be sold at grocery and pet stores
articles.content:
Ben & Jerry's now has an option for humans who want to indulge with their dogs. It's debuting Doggie Desserts, which will be sold at grocery and pet stores.
